body:
Comment 8 by **odysseus9672**: 
"No, a value sent over a chan is instantly available for receiving,"

If the message has to go between CPUs and between threads I do not see how that is
physically possible to guarantee. If you run the second version I uploaded, you'll
notice that there is not always a message waiting on killchan for main to remove. In
other words, the seqMaker has stopped and there is no message waiting for main to stop
sending messages to it.

Again, thanks for the help. :)
